Headline: #67 67th/69th/71st Temporary Reroute at 71st/Lawndale
ShortDescription: #67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage nr 71st/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 71st/Lawndale.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Northbound Reroute near Ashland/Clark
ShortDescription: Northbound #50 Damen buses are rerouted via Ashland, Bryn Mawr, Clark, Catalpa, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Ashland/Clark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Bryn Mawr, Clark, Catalpa, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Ashland/Clark.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/LaSalle
ShortDescription: #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Wentworth, 59th, State, then resume their normal route at 63rd, due to street blockage near 63rd/LaSalle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Wentworth, 59th, State, then resume their normal route at 63rd, due to street blockage near 63rd/LaSalle.

Headline: Brown Line Service Experiencing Minor Delays Due to Bridge Lift
ShortDescription: Brown Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge over the Chicago River, downtown.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge over the Chicago River, downtown.

Shuttle buses are available between Merchandise Mart and Clark/Lake to provide connecting service.
 
Some trains may be held in stations or turned back towards Kimball before reaching the bridge to maintain service across the remainder of the route. Bus shuttle service is available at Merchandise Mart and Clark/Lake. Listen for announcements and check train destination signs when boarding. Crews are working to correct the problem to allow us to safely resume service.
 
We apology for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Dept. of Bridge works to complete the bridge lift operation.  Allow extra travel time.
